content.question: Works such as the transformation mask reflect the common belief of the Kwakwakaâ€™wakw, an indigenous people of the northwest coast of Canada, that

choices.label: mythical creatures have the ability to change shape into humans
if humans live virtuous lives, they will not be reborn as creatures
people have competing animal and human natures within them
if people worship animal spirits, they will be reborn in those forms

content.answer: mythical creatures have the ability to change shape into humans

topic.text: 5.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Indigenous American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
